title: Operation: Tango
description: Operation: Tango is an espionage-themed cooperative adventure challenging you and a friend to complete dangerous missions across the globe in a high-tech near-future world. As an exclusive team of two, you and your partner will become AGENT and HACKER , working in tandem to bring a high-tech global menace to its knees. With only your voice to link you, teamwork is crucial, and communication is key

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon R9 380
